name: The user is presented with error message for invalid code in Editor for Graph page

steps.name: Given  The user is in a page having an Editor with a Run button to test
When  The user enters invalid python code in Editor from sheet "pythonCode" and 1
Then  The user gets an error message as "NameError: name 'hello' is not defined on line 1"
